name: Balsamic Soy Roasted Garlic Mushrooms
description: Balsamic Soy Roasted Garlic Mushrooms Recipe : Simple and tasty mushrooms roasted in a balsamic-soy and garlic sauce!
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon thyme, chopped (or 1/4 teaspoon dried thyme)
instructions: Toss the mushrooms in the oil, balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, thyme, salt and pepper, arrange in a single layer on a baking pan and roast in a preheated 400F/200C oven until the mushrooms are tender, about 20 minutes, mixing half way through.
